scripts.buildDev:darwin:linux: rm -rf dist && mongo src/js/scripts/init.mongo.js && webpack --mode development --config webpack.server.config.js && webpack --mode development --config webpack.dev.config.js
scripts.buildDev:win32: mongo src/js/scripts/init.mongo.js && webpack --mode development --config webpack.server.config.js && webpack --mode development --config webpack.dev.config.js
scripts.buildProd:darwin:linux: rm -rf dist && mongo src/js/scripts/init.mongo.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.server.config.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.buildProd:win32: mongo src/js/scripts/init.mongo.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.server.config.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.prod.config.js
